enemies.name: Angry Crab
enemies.description: A grumpy crab that got caught on your line!
enemies.attack_message: The crab pinches you with its claws!

enemies.name: Slimer
enemies.description: A slimy creature.
enemies.attack_message: The Slimer oozes in your direction!

enemies.name: Bitch Fish
enemies.description: A tanky fish that fights to the death.
enemies.attack_message: The fish nibbles at you!

enemies.name: Rival Fisherman
enemies.description: A competitive fisherman who wants to out-fish you.
enemies.attack_message: The fisherman casts his line aggressively towards you!

enemies.name: Bird
enemies.description: A bird that swoops down to steal your shit.
enemies.attack_message: The bird pecks yo ass!

enemies.name: Water Witch
enemies.description: A mystical being that controls the waters.
enemies.attack_message: The witch casts a spell towards you!

enemies.name: Pirater
enemies.description: This fella pirates movies, music, and even video games.
enemies.attack_message: The pirater streams an unreleased movie!

enemies.name: Hermit Crab
enemies.description: A crab that hides in its shell.
enemies.attack_message: The hermit crab snaps at you!

enemies.name: Beach Bum
enemies.description: A lazy beachgoer who doesn't like to be disturbed.
enemies.attack_message: The beach bum throws sand at you!

enemies.name: Beach Monster
enemies.description: A terrifying creature that lurks beneath the waves.
enemies.attack_message: The beach monster roars and charges at you!

enemies.name: Mountain Cougar
enemies.description: Thats a cougar!
enemies.attack_message: The mountain cougar pounces on you!

enemies.name: Mountain Freak
enemies.description: A freak from the mountains.
enemies.attack_message: The mountain freak attacks with wild fury!

enemies.name: Grizzly Bear
enemies.description: A massive bear that roams the mountains.
enemies.attack_message: The grizzly bear swipes at you with its claws!

enemies.name: Mountain Troll
enemies.description: A hulking troll that guards the mountain passes.
enemies.attack_message: The mountain troll smashes the ground with its club!

enemies.name: Alien Instigator
enemies.description: An alien that stirs shit up around here.
enemies.attack_message: The alien gives you unsolicited advice!

enemies.name: Cosmic Horror
enemies.description: A being from beyond the stars, it defies all logic.
enemies.attack_message: The cosmic horror calls you gay!

enemies.name: Territorial Abomination
enemies.description: An unspeakable horror from the void.
enemies.attack_message: The abomination writhes and attacks!

enemies.name: Zombie
enemies.description: A reanimated corpse that craves flesh.
enemies.attack_message: The zombie bites you!

enemies.name: Sea Serpent
enemies.description: A legendary sea creature that lurks in the depths.
enemies.attack_message: The sea serpent lashes out with its tail!

enemies.name: Water Elemental
enemies.description: A creature made of water, it can manipulate the tides.
enemies.attack_message: The water elemental splashes you with a wave!

enemies.name: Golem
enemies.description: A massive stone creature that guards ancient secrets.
enemies.attack_message: The golem slams its fist down!
